org.dhbw.geo.database

Class DBConditionFence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBObject
      • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBCondition
        • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBConditionFence

  • public class DBConditionFence
extends DBCondition
    A geofence condition is a set of geofences which are observed.
    Author:
    Matthias

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<DBFence> fences

      • DBConditionFence

        public DBConditionFence(long id,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String type,
                        int serverId)
        Creates a new geofence condition. Use this to create geofence conditions fetched from the databse
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the geofence
        name - the name of the geofence
        type - the type of the geofence

    • Method Detail

      • selectAllFromDB

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DBCondition> selectAllFromDB()
        Selects all geofence conditions from the database.
        Returns:
        an arraylist of the geofence conditions fetched from the database

      • selectAllFromDB

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DBCondition> selectAllFromDB(long ruleId)
        Selects all geofence conditions from the database which are assigned to a given rule.
        Parameters:
        ruleId - the id of the rule for which the geofence conditions shall be selected
        Returns:
        an arraylist of the geofence conditions fetched from the database

      • selectFromDB

        public static DBConditionFence selectFromDB(long id)
        Selects a specific geofence condition from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the geofence condition
        Returns:
        the geofence condition fetched from the database

      • selectFromDB

        public static DBConditionFence selectFromDB(DBFence fence)
        Selects a specific geofence condition from the database to which the given fence belongs.
        Parameters:
        fence - the fence
        Returns:
        the geofence condition fetched from the database

        Parameters:

      • loadAllFences

        public void loadAllFences()
        Loads all geofences of the condition from the database. It only calls the database, if no geofences are loaded to the condition yet.

      • isConditionMet

        public boolean isConditionMet()
        Checks whether the condition is fulfilled. It is fulfilled, if the cell phone is in any geofence (type: Enter) or in none (type: Leave)
        Specified by:
        isConditionMet in class DBCondition
        Returns:
        true if the condition is fulfilled, false otherwise
